response.overview: A filmmaker revisits the story of his love after his partner’s cancer diagnosis, using images instead of words to capture their shared life. As he reflects on their past—from their first meeting in a Tel Aviv gay park and fleeting encounters with strangers to tender hikes, picnics, and the home they built together—he relives their intimacy and loss like a life flashing before his eyes. The film becomes a visual elegy, a meditation on memory, desire, and the eternal search for beauty within love, even as it fades.
response.title: Redreaming Us
